alert.note: Alert for Bitterroot, Sapphire Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 10 at 2:01AM MST until December 11 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST /4 AM PST/ MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations between 1 to 3 inches below 5000 feet and 4 to 10 inches above 5000 feet. * WHERE...Elk City, Highway 93 Sula to Lost Trail Pass, Lolo Pass, Dixie, and Highway 12 Lowell to Lolo Pass. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST /4 AM PST/ Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be affected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snowfall rates are expected late Saturday night into early Sunday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
